flash: Auto flash (i-flash) Effective range : (ISO AUTO) Normal Wide : approx. 50cm - 6.3m / 1.6ft. - 20.6ft. Telephoto : approx. 90cm - 3.5m / 2.9ft. - 11.4ft. Macro Wide : approx. 30cm - 80cm / 0.9ft. - 2.6 ft. Telephoto : approx. 80cm - 1.2m / 2.6ft. - 3.9ft.
terminal: Video output NTSC / PAL selectable with monaural sound Digital interface USB 1.1 Full-Speed
aperture: F3.5 / F8.0(Wide) F6.3 / F15.0 (Telephoto) with ND filter
movierecording: 1280 x 720pixels / 640 x 480pixels / 320 x 240pixels (30fps) with monaural sound. Zoom function can be used. Sounds will not be recorded during optical zoom operation.
sensitivity: Auto, ISO 100 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600 / 3200* (Standard Output Sensitivity) * ISO 3200 is effective in image size S.
lens: Name Fujinon 5x optical zoom lens Focal length f=4.6mm - 23mm, equivalent to 26 - 130mm on a 35mm format Full-aperture F3.5(Wide) - F6.3(Telephoto) Constitution 5 groups 6 lenses
storagemedia: Internal memory (none) SD / SDHC / SDXC memory card*2
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch, approx. 230K-dot, TFT color LCD monitor, approx. 96% coverage
flashmodes: Face detection OFF Auto, Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Slow Synchro. Face detection ON Red-eye Reduction Auto, Red-eye Reduction & Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Red-eye Reduction & Slow Synchro.
digitalzoom: Approx. 7.2x (up to approx. 36.0x, with 5x optical zoom)
fileformat: Still image JPEG (Exif Ver 2.3)*3 (Design rule for Camera File system compliant / DPOF-compatible) 3D still image:MPO compliant Movie AVI (Motion JPEG)
